ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] getting started
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well at 50+, it gets easier to control aggro with Jolt, and eventually Cinder Jolt and Jolting Blades.  Pre-50, it involves not taunting, knowing when to
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Rob LeBeau" <rlebeau65@...>
>
> I agree and understsand most of this but what or how
> does a ranger aggro control?
>
> Mine is 18 and I find it a little tough getting exp
> right now. High Pass Hold is always too busy. I am
> trying Sk with the KFC birds but as you said, I need a
> good tank and healer since anything higher than a
> Darkter wastes me.

Well at 50+, it gets easier to control aggro with Jolt, and eventually
Cinder Jolt and Jolting Blades. Pre-50, it involves not taunting, knowing
when to snare a mob, the distance that you fight a mob, etc. Even backing
away from a mob for a second or 2 can do a good enough job.

Erik Johnson
